caption.p: Bar graph of ( A) Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA), ( B) Yersinia enterocolitica (YE), and ( C) Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica (SE) (cefoxitin) antimicrobial activities (inhibition zone in mm) from seven registered cultivars and seven wild accessions. The means represented by the bars sharing the same letter are not significantly different.
